content.title: High School Examination
content.paragraph:
For my high school examination I chose to make a copy of the popular indie game Stardew Valley inside the game engine Unity. With how big of a game Stardew Valley is I wasn't able to finish or make art for it, however what I did make was most of the core mechanics such as;

Player Inventory, Crafting, Building and Breaking, Simple Combat, Farming, Day-Night Cycle and more.

I had counted over 4,000 lines of C# Code at one point.
